item1.title: Is fit.expert free?
item1.description: Yes! Currently, all our Testers have free access to all beta app features.

sliderContent.title: Is fit.expert free?
sliderContent.description: Yes! Currently, all our Testers have free access to all beta app features.

sliderContent.title: Do I have to use online payments?
sliderContent.description: No, you don’t have to. Our system gives you full flexibility — you can accept payments in cash, by bank transfer, or use our online payment integration if you want to simplify your financial management.

sliderContent.title: Can my clients use my profile and book training sessions?
sliderContent.description: Yes, absolutely. Your profile with availability will be visible after clicking the link that you can share on your social media (e.g., Instagram, Facebook, TikTok) or send directly to clients. The client doesn’t need to register — just click and book an available slot.

sliderContent.title: What does the booking process look like for the client?
sliderContent.description: The client clicks the link to your calendar, chooses a suitable time, and confirms the booking. You receive a notification and can manage all appointments from one place.

sliderContent.title: Do I need to have my own website?
sliderContent.description: No. Your profile in our app works like a mini-website — you can share the link, and clients will see your schedule, contact details, and offers. It’s a perfect solution if you don’t have your own website yet.

sliderContent.title: Can I set my own working hours and days off?
sliderContent.description: Yes. You have full control over your calendar. You can set hourly availability, days off, and block dates for vacations or other commitments.
